Chinese.name: COS同地域增量数据同步
Chinese.description: 本示例使用 COS 触发器，完成COS同地域不同bucket的增量数据同步。即当COS上有文件上传时，会自动触发函数完成不同bucket的实时数据同步。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要在函数环境变量里配置源bucket、目标bucket和地域信息，另外会使用到运行角色，需要确保角色有COS的copy接口权限。

English.name: COSSyncDataSameRegion
English.description: This example uses COS triggers to complete the incremental data synchronization between COS and different buckets in the same region. That is, when there is a file upload on COS, it will automatically trigger the function to complete the real-time data synchronization of different buckets.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to configure the source bucket, target bucket, and region information in the function environment variable. In addition, you will use the running role. You need to ensure that the role has the COS copy interface permission.
